item.label: Target Item
item.hint: An item, spell, or ability that will be used on targets when this behavior is triggered.

USE_ITEM.label: Use Original Item
USE_ITEM.hint: Uses original item respecting using and respecting its use limitations.

USE_ITEM_COPY.label: Use Copy of Item
USE_ITEM_COPY.hint: Uses a copy of the item, leaving the original untouched.

itemOpt.label: Item Treatment
itemOpt.hint: How should the target item be treated by this behavior?

effectSource.label: Effect Source
effectSource.hint: When the region behavior is triggered, where did the effect come from?
